programme.title: The Possession
Opsjednuta
programme.desc:
The Possession: Directed by Ole Bornedal. With Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Kyra Sedgwick, Natasha Calis, Madison Davenport. A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0431021/","name":"The Possession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NTcxMDU0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwMzExOA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2828435/","name":"Natasha Calis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604742/","name":"Jeffrey Dean Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097079/","name":"Ole Bornedal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0333096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1340000/","name":"Juliet Snowden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925482/","name":"Stiles White"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1757236/","name":"Leslie Gornstein"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918177561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY1MTY1NzYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDI2NjYxOA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjY1MTY1NzYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDI2NjYxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child. "},"datePublished":"2012-08-31","description":"A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.","keywords":"swarm of moths,sister sister relationship,possessed girl,dybbuk box,father daughter relationship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0431021/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Familiar Subgenre Given Great Life","reviewBody":"The Possession (2012) 

*** (out of 4) 

Extremely well-made and well-acted horror film about a recently divorced father (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) who buys his youngest daughter (Natasha Calis) a seemingly innocent box at a yard sale but soon the girl's behavior starts to change. The title pretty much tells you what happens to the little girl and I'm sure many of you are out there wondering if we really needed another possession movie. The answer is yes and especially since this one here turned out so well. I think you have to give the filmmakers a lot of credit for tackling a familiar sub-genre and being able to make it work without resorting to cheap, loud noise scares that seem to be attached to all horror movies today. I thought there were a lot of reasons why this film worked but one is the fact that you care about the father and feel his pain for losing someone close to him. The personal drama is something that THE EXORCIST used so well and the filmmakers here borrow from that and make sure the viewer can care about what's going on. Another strong point are the performances with Jeffrey Dean Morgan doing a fantastic job in the role of the father. It's rare to see horror films with such strong performances but Kyra Sedgwick is also strong as the mother. Calis is terrific in her bit as the young girl who finds herself falling apart. The limited special effects are good for what they are but we also get an incredibly effective music score. I didn't care for some of the style given to the film including the fast cuts to a black screen but this was just a minor issue. Still, THE POSSESSION gives a shot of energy to a genre that has so far in 2012 delivered one bomb after another."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57728,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

*** (out of 4) 

Extremely well-made and well-acted horror film about a recently divorced father (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) who buys his youngest daughter (Natasha Calis) a seemingly innocent box at a yard sale but soon the girl's behavior starts to change. The title pretty much tells you what happens to the little girl and I'm sure many of you are out there wondering if we really needed another possession movie. The answer is yes and especially since this one here turned out so well. Ukleti
programme.desc: Haunted: Directed by Lewis Gilbert. With Aidan Quinn, Kate Beckinsale, Anthony Andrews, John Gielgud. A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113269/","name":"Haunted","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDg4ODcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1NTEyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001644/","name":"Aidan Quinn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000762/","name":"Anthony Andrews"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0318150/","name":"Lewis Gilbert"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054943/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378562/","name":"James Herbert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695112/","name":"Timothy Prager"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445844/","name":"Bob Kellett"}],"datePublished":"1995-10-27","description":"A skeptical professor visits a remote British estate to debunk allegations of psychic phenomena, but soon finds himself haunted by a ghost from his own past.","keywords":"1920s,independent film,tombstone,title same as book,nanny","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113269/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johnmbale"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"There is something nasty in the Lake.","reviewBody":"A modestly effective supernatural thriller based on the James Herbert novel, and directed by veteran Lewis Gilbert. Weakness is the over lighting of many scenes that would have been much better in low key, but there are moments of shock that work well, especially in the early sequences. Quinn is somewhat wooden, and its left to Kate Beckinsale to add zest and glamor, which she does effectively, with several nude scenes and some moments of steamy sex. Lewis Gilbert directs without enthusiasm, though at times can we see traces of his earlier and better screen work. Finally the plot which has a major twist at the ending, is full of red herrings and pot holes, which makes it less than believable. A precursor to "The Others" which handles a similar situation with more classic flair, better cast and direction.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6244,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ratna bolnica
programme.desc: Tamo gdje je rat ima ranjenih, a tamo gdje ima ranjenih, tu je tim hrabrih medicinara. Liječnici i medicinske sestre u medicinskoj jedinici na uzletištu Kandahar... Tamo gdje je rat ima ranjenih, a tamo gdje ima ranjenih, tu je tim hrabrih medicinara. Liječnici i medicinske sestre u medicinskoj jedinici na uzletištu Kandahar, u južnom Afganistanu, obično liječe vojno osoblje koje sudjeluje u borbama, civile zahvaćene unakrsnom vatrom, čak i neprijatelja protiv kojeg su ovdje. Kako rat bjesni, ovi međunarodni medicinari čine čuda kako bi spasili živote onima kojima je potrebna.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

Ransom promised both so it was intriguing to me and I gave it a chance. The way the young college girl got into the first scene without ID was a bit far fetched. The head of the agency is a bit of a James Bond type which is appealing. Beaumont is like Bond in that he is mysterious and well dressed but can handle any altercation! There is a story within a story which I find holds my interest. It looks like this could be stories that are resolved each week which also appeals to me. Complete the problem and story each week and let me move on! I think it will be an entertaining show so I will continue to watch it. If you like the above you will like the show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3255,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Akcijska serija Future Man prikazuje život Josha Futturmana kojeg regrutiraju misteriozni posjetitelji nakon što pobjeđuje u igrici. Što se kasnije zbiva, saznajte u uzbudljivim trenucima ove serije! Future Man akcijska je serija koja na komičan način prikazuje glavnog lika, Josha Futturmana, mladića koji kada ne obavlja svoj posao domara, igra igricu pod nazivom Biotic Wars. Nakon što pobjeđuje, misteriozni posjetitelji pojavljuju se u njegovoj kući. Zašto su tu i što će se dalje dogoditi, saznajte gledajući ovu zanimljivu seriju!

Ransom promised both so it was intriguing to me and I gave it a chance. The way the young college girl got into the first scene without ID was a bit far fetched. The head of the agency is a bit of a James Bond type which is appealing. Beaumont is like Bond in that he is mysterious and well dressed but can handle any altercation! There is a story within a story which I find holds my interest. It looks like this could be stories that are resolved each week which also appeals to me. Complete the problem and story each week and let me move on! I think it will be an entertaining show so I will continue to watch it. If you like the above you will like the show.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3255,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Akcijska serija Future Man prikazuje život Josha Futturmana kojeg regrutiraju misteriozni posjetitelji nakon što pobjeđuje u igrici. Što se kasnije zbiva, saznajte u uzbudljivim trenucima ove serije! Future Man akcijska je serija koja na komičan način prikazuje glavnog lika, Josha Futturmana, mladića koji kada ne obavlja svoj posao domara, igra igricu pod nazivom Biotic Wars. Nakon što pobjeđuje, misteriozni posjetitelji pojavljuju se u njegovoj kući. Zašto su tu i što će se dalje dogoditi, saznajte gledajući ovu zanimljivu seriju!

programme.desc: Directed by Billy Kent. With Alex Wolff, Parker Posey, Brendan Fraser, Julia Garner. 14-year old genius Eli is rejected from Harvard, and ends up at Ivy League wannabe Whittman-U. There, Eli meets 41 year-old Leo, a gambler who has dropped out of life to enroll in college, who teaches him every bad habit he knows.

"},"datePublished":"2013-09-13","description":"A young boy grows up as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.","keywords":"knight,quest,kingdom,army,wizard","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1639826/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A kids animated tale, about a young knight with plenty of adventures , fights , action and amusement","reviewBody":"Wonderful story about a young boy becomes a man as he embarks on a quest to become a knight , as he wants to follow in the footsteps of his grandfather and join the Knights of the Roundtable . It deals with Justin (Freddie Highmore voice) lives in a kingdom where bureaucrats rule and knights have been ousted. Justin, the son of chief counsel to the Queen, lives in a kingdom where knights have been outlawed, and the land is over subscribed with laws for everything imaginable. His dream is to be become one of the Knights of Valour, like his grandfather was, but his father Reginald (voice by Alfred Molina) , the chief counsel to the Queen , wants his son to follow in his footsteps and become a lawyer. After an inspiring visit to his beloved grandmother and bidding farewell to his supposed lady-love Lara (Tamsin Egerton) , Justin leaves home and embarks on a quest to become a knight. Along the way he meets the beautiful, feisty Talia (Saoirse Ronan) ,and is mentored by three monks Whilst an unlikely candidate for knighthood, Justin must rise to the challenge quickly when banished former knight Sir Heraclio and his army, lead by Sota (Rupert Everett) , return and threaten to destroy the Kingdom . As Sir Heraclio (Mark Strong) wants Justin to join him and fight by his side. When the teen refuses, the king has no other choice but to unleash his flesh-hungry horde of vicious warriors on Justin and his girlfriend. Can he save the Kingdom from impending doom and a few other clichés? .

This amusing 3D cartoon has great animated sequences well staged with stylish and vitality , adventure , romance , outstanding final and results to be pretty entertaining . Enjoyable action sequences in castles , monastery , falls , including amusing ending confrontation at the climax of the film and a fun flying croc . Well produced by Antonio Banderas, fresh from providing his sexy Spanish tones for four Shrek films, has clearly decided that providing the voice of a cat in some near decent animated movies has given him all the knowledge he needs to produce similar animated box office gold . While the film has an addictive color and design graphics and 3D computer generator animation itself is extremely attractive, we are in presence of a film too simplistic and Manichean in his story to end. So, unfortunately, not much progress in achieving empathy and convey emotions that excite. Along his quest, the protagonist encounters a slew of quirky characters, a fun plethora of secondaries , as a strange wizard called Melquiades voiced by David Wailians , the handsome Sir Cloirex voice by Antonio Banderas ; the monks : Blucher , Legantir and Braulio voiced by James Cosmo , Charles Dance and Barry Humphries respectively , who teach and test him in the ancient ways of the Knights of Valour . The character "Sota" is inspired in one card of the Spanish deck, which is equivalent to the Jack in the international Deck, and has a very similar look to this character. Also, the name of the villain, Heraclio, matches the best known publisher of card decks in Spain, Heraclio Fournier .

Furthermore , this funny movie contains a nice Original Music by Ilan Eshkeri . Colorful and glimmer Cinematography by Javier Fernández .This Spanish motion picture was well written and directed Manuel Sicilia . Worthwhile seeing , better than average . The film will appeal to kiddies and teenagers .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5743,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Teen Spirit
Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Directed by Max Minghella. With Elle Fanning, Agnieszka Grochowska, Archie Madekwe, Zlatko Buric. Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story.

gum","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3486626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Reno-Rangan"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Returning home and fighting back for it.","reviewBody":"Frankly, I did not think there will a sequel, but this one came out and I say I'm not fully disappointed. It is an acceptable film with a good message told with full of cliches. The story continued from where the previous one had ended. Right away a new adventure begins. Surly and his friends, after losing their stock of food, now forced to return to their natural home, the park. But the place is getting turned into an amusement park by an evil mayor. So they plan to fight back and how they succeed are the revealed in the remaining part.

As I said, not bad. At least the children would enjoy it better. The new characters are good, but that did not bring more fun. The comedies were average. With this year's average result from all the animated feature that had released, this film does not look so bad at all. Only if the story had been much better, it would have achieved a better result. The production and all the voice-over work were good. I don't know there will be another sequel, but I don't wish, except if they come up with some good story to tell for all ages. It's just once watchable!

programme.title: War Arrow
Ratna strela
programme.desc:
War Arrow: Directed by George Sherman. With Maureen O'Hara, Jeff Chandler, John McIntire, Suzan Ball. Major Howell Brady arrives in Indian Territory in hopes of recruiting peaceful, relocated Seminoles to help the army fight rampaging Kiowas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0046532/","name":"War Arrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3YzM2YWQtZWM3ZC00MzlmLWE4OWEtMjU5MzJmZjhhYTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0MzMzNjA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Romance","War","Western"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000058/","name":"Maureen O'Hara"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001996/","name":"Jeff Chandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570615/","name":"John McIntire"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792450/","name":"George Sherman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021358/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371088/","name":"John Michael Hayes"}],"datePublished":"1954-01-06","description":"Major Howell Brady arrives in Indian Territory in hopes of recruiting peaceful, relocated Seminoles to help the army fight rampaging Kiowas.","keywords":"indian territory,u.s. cavalry,seminole indian,based on true story,taming of the shrew","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0046532/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FightingWesterner"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watchable, If Uninspired Cavalry Picture","reviewBody":"Cavalry officer Jeff Chandler trains a peaceful tribe of displaced Seminoles to fight against a warring tribe of Kiowa, while at the same time butting heads with stubborn commanding officer John McIntire and romancing pretty "widow" Maureen O'Hara, who's husband may or may not still be alive as the leader of the renegades.

This B-western has some okay, but short and clumsy action scenes. The plot is a bit far-fetched and the romance seems a little contrived, with O'Hara and Chandler having very little chemistry.

Still, it's not boring. War Arrow is fast-paced enough, with a compact running time.

As the Seminole chief's daughter, Suzan Ball is very beautiful (even more so than Maureen O'Hara!), even if her character is rather unlikable. On the other hand, Noah Beery Jr. is an always likable comic foil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":723,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

Major Howell Brady arrives in Indian Territory in hopes of recruiting peaceful, relocated Seminoles to help the army fight rampaging Kiowas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0046532/","name":"War Arrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3YzM2YWQtZWM3ZC00MzlmLWE4OWEtMjU5MzJmZjhhYTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0MzMzNjA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Romance","War","Western"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000058/","name":"Maureen O'Hara","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001996/","name":"Jeff Chandler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570615/","name":"John McIntire"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792450/","name":"George Sherman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021358/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371088/","name":"John Michael Hayes"],"datePublished":"1954-01-06","description":"Major Howell Brady arrives in Indian Territory in hopes of recruiting peaceful, relocated Seminoles to help the army fight rampaging Kiowas.","keywords":"indian territory,u.s. cavalry,seminole indian,based on true story,taming of the shrew","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0046532/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"FightingWesterner","dateCreated":"2010-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watchable, If Uninspired Cavalry Picture","reviewBody":"Cavalry officer Jeff Chandler trains a peaceful tribe of displaced Seminoles to fight against a warring tribe of Kiowa, while at the same time butting heads with stubborn commanding officer John McIntire and romancing pretty "widow" Maureen O'Hara, who's husband may or may not still be alive as the leader of the renegades.

This B-western has some okay, but short and clumsy action scenes. The plot is a bit far-fetched and the romance seems a little contrived, with O'Hara and Chandler having very little chemistry.

Still, it's not boring. War Arrow is fast-paced enough, with a compact running time.

As the Seminole chief's daughter, Suzan Ball is very beautiful (even more so than Maureen O'Hara!), even if her character is rather unlikable. On the other hand, Noah Beery Jr. is an always likable comic foil.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":723,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"duration":"PT1H18M"</script><metacontent="

face,beating,rematch","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Charming and enjoyable sequel with the Italian Stallion taking on the brute Clubber Land , Mr. T","reviewBody":"Acceptable follow-up in which Balboa is willing to risk his life against a violent boxer , Clubber Lang . Officially a sequel is most a rehash but happens to be a nice third chapter about Rocky saga with intimate Stallone . Interesting sequel that works every time and in which beloved Balboa is considering retirement , but he faces off a tough contender performed by Mister T (A Team) , being dethroned by the obnoxious , corpulent boxer , that's why Rocky sinks into a depression . Excessive confidence and complacency soon give rise to lose his heavyweight championship title . Two-bit fighter Rocky is now almost retired and has hit rock bottom , but he rises from ashes to fight a daring contender . About to be retired from boxing and back from riches to ring , Rocky takes on a new combat . Although he is homaged as one of the greatest boxing champions in the history also is panned as a down-and-out fighter . Then , ¨The Italian Stallion¨ , the one time champion , returns to take on the ultimate boxing combat , as he comes out from retirement for fame and self-respect to combat the strongest , youngest and faster contender . While Rocky attempts to prove himself and his family , his wife (Talia Shire), brother-in-law (Burt Young) and his veteran trainer (Burguess Meredith) . Shortly after , Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) and Duke (Tony Burton) decide to train Rocky for a rematch against the brave and invincible opponent Lang , so Rocky can attempt to win the championship back .

This agreeable predictable entertainment displays splendidly the 'formula Rocky'. The movie works in usual manner , fitting appropriately to franchise , even though we know the plot the film works . This soaper on the ring is developed in gentleness , dignity , feel-good style as well as the initial outing . Great training montage and spectacular and climatic final bout . Writer-director-actor Stallone new entry is surprisingly entertaining and packs good feeling . Usual and nostalgic musical score by Bill Conti and atmospheric cinematography by Bill Butler . The motion picture was lavishly financed by the producers of complete saga , Robert Chartoff and Irwin Winkler and well directed by Stallone who along John G. Avildsen created the six Rocky saga.

In previous and subsequent entries the contenders were the followings : ¨Rocky I¨ and ¨II¨ was Carl Weathers ; ¨Rocky III¨ the fast-mouthed and cruel boxer Mister T ; ¨Rocky IV¨ against a massive Russian boxer played by Dolph Lundgren ; ¨Rocky V¨ in which Rocky , nicknamed as the Chicken Stallion , lives from records being ostracized , but our hero returns as a coach , as Rocky goes back despite his own cerebral damage through a rematch on the streets , as he fights Tommy 'Machine' Gunn/Tommy Morrison ; meanwhile , the champ must adjust to his family's new life on bankruptcy ; subsequently ¨Rocky Balboa¨ proving his estranged young son Milo Ventiglimia who still can fight . And , finally , ¨Creed¨ in which Rocky eventually agrees to mentor Adonis , son of the known boxing champion Apollo Creed . Rating : Good , being impossible to dislike , the result is deliciously corny agreeable and predictable amusement . Although we've seen it all before , Sylvester manages to make it work one more time and it works every way even better than successive Rockys .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

2 for Rocky III"},"datePublished":"1982-05-28","description":"After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.","keywords":"boxing movie,hit in the face,sweaty face,beating,rematch","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Charming and enjoyable sequel with the Italian Stallion taking on the brute Clubber Land , Mr. T","reviewBody":"Acceptable follow-up in which Balboa is willing to risk his life against a violent boxer , Clubber Lang . Officially a sequel is most a rehash but happens to be a nice third chapter about Rocky saga with intimate Stallone . Interesting sequel that works every time and in which beloved Balboa is considering retirement , but he faces off a tough contender performed by Mister T (A Team) , being dethroned by the obnoxious , corpulent boxer , that's why Rocky sinks into a depression . Excessive confidence and complacency soon give rise to lose his heavyweight championship title . Two-bit fighter Rocky is now almost retired and has hit rock bottom , but he rises from ashes to fight a daring contender . About to be retired from boxing and back from riches to ring , Rocky takes on a new combat . Although he is homaged as one of the greatest boxing champions in the history also is panned as a down-and-out fighter . Then , ¨The Italian Stallion¨ , the one time champion , returns to take on the ultimate boxing combat , as he comes out from retirement for fame and self-respect to combat the strongest , youngest and faster contender . While Rocky attempts to prove himself and his family , his wife (Talia Shire), brother-in-law (Burt Young) and his veteran trainer (Burguess Meredith) . Shortly after , Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) and Duke (Tony Burton) decide to train Rocky for a rematch against the brave and invincible opponent Lang , so Rocky can attempt to win the championship back .

This agreeable predictable entertainment displays splendidly the 'formula Rocky'. The movie works in usual manner , fitting appropriately to franchise , even though we know the plot the film works . This soaper on the ring is developed in gentleness , dignity , feel-good style as well as the initial outing . Great training montage and spectacular and climatic final bout . Writer-director-actor Stallone new entry is surprisingly entertaining and packs good feeling . Usual and nostalgic musical score by Bill Conti and atmospheric cinematography by Bill Butler . The motion picture was lavishly financed by the producers of complete saga , Robert Chartoff and Irwin Winkler and well directed by Stallone who along John G. Avildsen created the six Rocky saga.

In previous and subsequent entries the contenders were the followings : ¨Rocky I¨ and ¨II¨ was Carl Weathers ; ¨Rocky III¨ the fast-mouthed and cruel boxer Mister T ; ¨Rocky IV¨ against a massive Russian boxer played by Dolph Lundgren ; ¨Rocky V¨ in which Rocky , nicknamed as the Chicken Stallion , lives from records being ostracized , but our hero returns as a coach , as Rocky goes back despite his own cerebral damage through a rematch on the streets , as he fights Tommy 'Machine' Gunn/Tommy Morrison ; meanwhile , the champ must adjust to his family's new life on bankruptcy ; subsequently ¨Rocky Balboa¨ proving his estranged young son Milo Ventiglimia who still can fight . And , finally , ¨Creed¨ in which Rocky eventually agrees to mentor Adonis , son of the known boxing champion Apollo Creed . Rating : Good , being impossible to dislike , the result is deliciously corny agreeable and predictable amusement . Although we've seen it all before , Sylvester manages to make it work one more time and it works every way even better than successive Rockys .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177553,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Veber was a director and screenwriter of a lot of very good comedies from the 1980's and 1970's, most of them featuring comic Pierre Richard. Veber also directed the hilarious Le dîner de cons, in 1998. So, Le Jaguar had all the elements of Veber movies. It's not genious, but it had imagination in situations where a man (Bruel) had trouble because he's at a place or in a situation where he's not suppose to be, and he's got help from a man (Reno) who is at the right place. For good smiles, see this movie, or any of the Veber films. Veber was a director and screenwriter of a lot of very good comedies from the 1980's and 1970's, most of them featuring comic Pierre Richard. Veber also directed the hilarious Le dîner de cons, in 1998. So, Le Jaguar had all the elements of Veber movies. It's not genious, but it had imagination in situations where a man (Bruel) had trouble because he's at a place or in a situation where he's not suppose to be, and he's got help from a man (Reno) who is at the right place. For good smiles, see this movie, or any of the Veber films. monster,alien,party","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1060277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Midgarmerc"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The First Great Monster Film of the Century","reviewBody":"If you haven't heard by now Cloverfield is a film about a giant monster attacking Manhattan all seen through the perspective of a 20-something's hand-held camera. The film has been hyped for months via viral marketing, JJ Abrams fan boys, and media coverage/ monster speculation. Did it live up to the hype? The answer is OH GOD YES Cloverfield is by far the most intense monster film I have ever seen in my lifetime, after the initial 15 minutes of character introduction and whatnot the film does not go 5 minutes without a HOLY CRAP moment. Constantly driving you to the edge of your seat at every turn and it really pulls no punches, I was surprised to learn it was rated PG13. Now the film is entirely filmed in shaky cam since you cant really survive a monster attack pushing a trolley around and it just works, you may get motion sickness though so be warned. The camera itself becomes a character of the film as it IS the viewer making everything happening on-screen more and more realistic. Now the acting is amateur but thats for the best considering that the film would have made no sense if they had used big name actors/actresses, the characters are not that deep either and mostly serve as fodder, comic relief, moral guidance, panic, commentary, puzzlement, a little bit of annoyance, in other words they're people surviving a monster attack. The presentation is brilliant, the only music heard is in the party and at the ending credits and the special effects are some of the most seamless stuff you'll ever see in a film. The monster itself is actually not seen in its entirety only being viewed from different angles for the audience to piece it together as the survivors themselves are, you pretty much know as much as they do about everything going on making you actually feel like you're there. Critics compare the film to Blair Witch meets Godzilla but it is so much more than that, Cloverfield is the definitive American Monster Film, best if seen on the opening weekend just to hear the audience's reactions not to mention the presentation is far greater on the big screen, watch it again to see the things you missed or just to enjoy the ride again, admittedly the shock value will wane with multiple viewings but for what it's worth Cloverfield is an excellent piece of film and special effect engineering and is the first great monster film of the millennium. Its also downright scary at parts. 8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":376730,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sluškinjina priča
programme.desc: "Sluškinjina priča" govori o životu u distopijskom Gileadu, totalitarnom društvu u nekadašnjim Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama. Suočen s oštrim padom nataliteta, Gileadom vlada izopačeni... "Sluškinjina priča" govori o životu u distopijskom Gileadu, totalitarnom društvu u nekadašnjim Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama. Suočen s oštrim padom nataliteta, Gileadom vlada izopačeni fundamentalistički režim koji tretira žene kao imovinu. Kao jedna od rijetkih preostalih plodnih žena, Offred je sluškinja, jedna iz kaste žena prisiljenih na seksualno ropstvo u posljednjem očajničkom pokušaju da se razoreni svijet ponovno napuči. Offred se mora snaći među zapovjednicima, njihovim ženama, domaćicama marthama i svojim kolegicama sluškinjama.

credits.actor: Jana McKinnon, Bruno Alexander, Tonio Arango, Lea Drinda, Rosa Enskat, Michelangelo Fortuzzi, Heiner Hardt, Jürgen Haug

programme.title: Roditeljske muke
programme.desc: Nova humoristična serija istražuje paradoks koji svaki roditelj poznaje, ali nikad ne priznaje: da biste rado umrli za svoju djecu, ali često ih također želite ubiti. Nova humoristična serija istražuje paradoks koji svaki roditelj poznaje, ali nikad ne priznaje: da biste rado umrli za svoju djecu, ali često ih također želite ubiti. Paul (Martin Freeman) brižan je otac koji otkriva da baš i nije čovjek kakvim se smatrao. Njegova partnerica u ovoj nemoguće teškoj roditeljskoj situaciji je Ally (Daisy Haggard), koja vodi tonski studio, nasmijava Paula i sposobna je čitati priče svojoj djeci dok praktički spava. U ovoj iskrenoj i beskompromisnoj komediji Paul i Ally balansiraju između svojih karijera, ostarjelih roditelja, hipoteke, preokreta u vezi i nezavidnih iznenađenja u odgoju svoje male djece, Lukea i Ave.

credits.actor: Iain Armitage, Zoe Perry, Lance Barber, Montana Jordan, Raegan Revord, Matt Hobby, Annie Potts, Ed Begley Jr.

programme.title: Dolina suza
programme.desc: S pojačanjima satima daleko, Yoav vodi svoju malu jedinicu u nemoguću borbu kako bi zaštitio neobučene i loše opremljene hermonske obavještajce. S pojačanjima satima daleko, Yoav vodi svoju malu jedinicu u nemoguću borbu kako bi zaštitio neobučene i loše opremljene hermonske obavještajce. Nedaleko odatle Yoavova djevojka i časnica Dafna opire se naredbama da se sve žene evakuiraju s prvih crta bojišnice. U međuvremenu, 87. je gurnuta u bitku i trpi poražavajući gubitak. U nadi da će se vratiti svojim prijateljima u posadi tenka, Melakhi uhvati prijevoz s Menijem koji kreće iz grada u potragu za svojim sinom.

programme.title: Dolina suza
programme.desc: Unatoč mentalnim i fizičkim ranama, Melakhi, Marco i Yoni dobrovoljno se vraćaju u pakao. Unatoč mentalnim i fizičkim ranama, Melakhi, Marco i Yoni dobrovoljno se vraćaju u pakao. Kako sati odmiču ususret masovne oklopne bitke, Melakhi svoje sumnje usmjerava na Marca, dok Dafna i Avinoam shvaćaju da imaju zajedničku poveznicu.

programme.title: Dolina suza
programme.desc: Gledajući stotine neprijateljskih tenkova u naizgled bezizlaznoj bitci, Melakhi stupa na čelo 87. prisiljavajući svoju posadu da preispitaju cjelokupnu obuku kako bi izašli živi. Gledajući stotine neprijateljskih tenkova u naizgled bezizlaznoj bitci, Melakhi stupa na čelo 87. prisiljavajući svoju posadu da preispitaju cjelokupnu obuku kako bi izašli živi. U međuvremenu, kada se Avinoam preda kako bi zaštitio Dafnu, njegovi se strahovi od zatočeništva ostvaruju. Sa svojim životima na kocki, Meni i Yoni napokon se mire, a Marco se pokušava iskupiti Melakhiju.

programme.title: Normalni ljudi

Connell se zabrine kad ga prijatelji zadirkuju zbog Marianne sumnjajući da su pogodili istinu o njihovoj vezi. Potaknut tjeskobom, Connell donosi neočekivanu odluku koja povrijedi Marianne i uzrokuje razdor između njega i njegove majke Lorraine. programme.title: Normalni ljudi
programme.desc: Mjesecima poslije Connell stiže na koledž Trinity u Dublinu. Pronašao je sobu u studentskom domu i upoznao svog novog ukućana Nialla. Mjesecima poslije Connell stiže na koledž Trinity u Dublinu. Pronašao je sobu u studentskom domu i upoznao svog novog ukućana Nialla. Connell nevoljko prihvaća pozivnicu na zabavu novoga kolege Garetha. Kako se osjeća neugodno u pomodnom društvu prisutnih, Gareth mu ponudi da ga upozna s nekim poznatim iz Sliga i tako se Connell nađe licem u lice s neočekivanim gostom.

programme.title: The One and Only Ivan

programme.title: Roditeljske muke
programme.desc: Serija istražuje paradoks koji svaki roditelj poznaje, ali nikad ne priznaje: da biste rado umrli za svoju djecu, ali često ih također želite ubiti. Serija istražuje paradoks koji svaki roditelj poznaje, ali nikad ne priznaje: da biste rado umrli za svoju djecu, ali često ih također želite ubiti. Paul (Martin Freeman) brižan je otac koji otkriva da baš i nije čovjek kakvim se smatrao. Njegova partnerica u ovoj nemoguće teškoj roditeljskoj situaciji je Ally (Daisy Haggard), koja vodi tonski studio, nasmijava Paula i sposobna je čitati priče svojoj djeci dok praktički spava. U ovoj iskrenoj i beskompromisnoj komediji Paul i Ally balansiraju između svojih karijera, ostarjelih roditelja, hipoteke, preokreta u vezi i nezavidnih iznenađenja u odgoju svoje male djece, Lukea i Ave.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Loy odbija kapitulirati pred Faddama, Gaetano prisiljava Jostu da se nametne kao vođa, a liječnik Senator i Ebal pokušavaju održati mir dok napetosti i dalje rastu. Loy odbija kapitulirati pred Faddama, Gaetano prisiljava Jostu da se nametne kao vođa, a liječnik Senator i Ebal pokušavaju održati mir dok napetosti i dalje rastu. Zelmare i Swanee se pritaje, Ethelrida dolazi do uznemirujućeg otkrića, Thurman pokušava ispraviti stvari, a zidovi se počinju zatvarati oko Odisa.

programme.title: Sluškinjina priča
programme.desc: "Sluškinjina priča" govori o životu u distopijskom Gileadu, totalitarnom društvu u nekadašnjim Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama. "Sluškinjina priča" govori o životu u distopijskom Gileadu, totalitarnom društvu u nekadašnjim Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama. Suočen s oštrim padom nataliteta, Gileadom vlada izopačeni fundamentalistički režim koji tretira žene kao imovinu. Kao jedna od rijetkih preostalih plodnih žena, Offred je sluškinja, jedna iz kaste žena prisiljenih na seksualno ropstvo u posljednjem očajničkom pokušaju da se razoreni svijet ponovno napuči. Offred se mora snaći među zapovjednicima, njihovim ženama, domaćicama marthama i svojim kolegicama sluškinjama.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
Kum 3
programme.desc:
The Godfather: Part III: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Al Pacino, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Andy Garcia. Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099674/","name":"The Godfather: Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWFlYWY2YjYtNjdhNi00MzVlLTg2MTMtMWExNzg4NmM5NmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk5Mzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000412/","name":"Andy Garcia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035894/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701374/","name":"Mario Puzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1237827865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"See the never-before-seen version of the final film, The #GodfatherCoda: The Death of Michael Corleone. Newly re-edited with restored picture and sound, experience the filmmaker’s true vision for the conclusion of the most celebrated saga in cinema history. In select theaters starting December 4."},"datePublished":"1990-12-25","description":"Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.","keywords":"opera,vatican,italy,gangster,catholic church","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tazamaster"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"It really isn't that bad..","reviewBody":"Having heard the endless amount of critique and insults that the last part of the Godfather saga carries.. I have to disagree. Although people seem to love to hate Sophie Coppola and say she ruined the film, I think her part alone wasn't that frail it'd ruin the entire cinematic experience. Saying that is just humorous. Also, the absence of Tom Hagen played by Robert Duvall is really a loss and even I think this film would've been a lot better if there was him in it.. but he got too greedy and couldn't make it into the movie, and that's that. I'm not going to judge a movie by what it could have been, but what it is and how good it ends up being.

Despite some shortcomings, Godfather Part 3 is a decent ending to the trilogy. While it may have been an attempt to cash off the audience, they still have Coppola bring us his finest directing. I found Al Pacino's performance extremely satisfying and even terrifyingly so. He embodies the mistakes and losses of his life with excellent skill, showing us a don that has lost his health, the loved ones of his life and even the respect for himself. While I never found Diane Keaton's performances in the saga that good, she still fills the spot required, same goes for Talia Shire, whose role in the ending finale of the film really came as a surprise to me - which was a good thing. I didn't find her role in Part 2 too appealing but in this one she has more character, more importance. Sophie Coppola was OK, like I said a lot of people have complained about her acting skills and I gotta admit she was a little "stiff" or sorts in some scenes but it's not notable all the time and it didn't spoil any moods for me. Andy Carcia was just excellent, my favorite add to the saga cast, playing the son of his father with excellence.

So, umm.. this film is perfectly fine. The ending finale was tremendously well shot and very climatic, filled with a lot of excitement. I'm telling you this movie is a great ending to the saga even because of that one particular scene so just go see it, despite what a lot of people have said about, badmouthing it for faulty reasons.. it brought a tear into my eye. It did.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367415,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Obični ljudi
programme.desc: Slučajna smrt starijeg sina imućne obitelji duboko potrese odnose između ogorčene majke, dobroćudnog oca i krivnjom progonjenog mlađeg sina. Redateljski prvijenac Roberta Redforda dobio je 1980. "Oscar" za najbolji film. To je jednostavna, ali bolno emotivna priča o raspadu "savršene" obitelji. Tinejdžer Conrad (Timothy Hutton) živi pod oblakom krivnje nakon što mu se brat utopi kad im se brod prevrne na jezeru Michigan. Unatoč intenzivnoj terapiji sa psihijatrom (Judd Hirsch), Conrad se ne može osloboditi uvjerenja da je trebao umrijeti umjesto brata, a ni rastreseni mu roditelji (Donald Sutherland i Mary Tyler Moore) ne nude neku utjehu. Dječaka iz potištenosti izbavi ljubav s Jeannine (Elizabeth McGovern). Pobjednik u svakom pogledu, "Obični ljudi" (adaptacija romana Judith Guest) doseže vrhunce u prizorima s Mary Tyler Moore koja je izvrsno i perceptivno odglumila vječno nasmiješenu suprugu iz predgrađa koja se pravi slijepom i majku kojoj je važna samo vanjština.

credits.actor: Dominique Reymond, Carlo Brandt, Grégoire Didelot, Iannis Jaccoud, Marianne Basler, Baptiste Coustenoble, Camille Figuereo, Christophe Sermet

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
Most špijuna
programme.desc: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Tom Hanks, Mark Rylance, Alan Alda, Amy Ryan. During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

theory","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0268978/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chicagoconsultant"},"dateCreated":"2012-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb Acting and a Gem of a Film","reviewBody":"Ed Harris, Russel Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, and Paul Bettany were terrific.

The film had great balance and is worth a viewing.

The story boldly addresses mental illness as a handicap.

Because of the quality of the acting and directing, this movie is a beacon of hope for people of all disabilities. The film illustrates to the viewer how deeply a handicap can infiltrate the domestic, professional, and personal lives of those unfortunate to have these types of issues. I hope Ron Howard and the acting crew can get together again for something similar. This was a great film, that also serves an important role for awareness to people that might not understand how deeply debilitating these issues can be, and also gets the message across that not all should be marginalized.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":864236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
Između života i smrti
programme.desc:
Bringing Out the Dead: Directed by Martin Scorsese. With Nicolas Cage, Patricia Arquette, John Goodman, Ving Rhames. Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights." data-id="main"/><script Dead","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1002176793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjlmMmMxZTYtZjg2MC00OWFlLWI4MjktNDExN2UzYTZlYjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjlmMmMxZTYtZjg2MC00OWFlLWI4MjktNDExN2UzYTZlYjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"datePublished":"2000-02-10","description":"Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.","keywords":"post punk,movie flop,paramount,disney,ghost","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163988/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Narrative-wise it is unsatisfying but it has style and pace that makes it worth seeing","reviewBody":"Frank Pierce is a New York City paramedic. We join his story when he is facing down a double shift of graveyard work despite being burnt out and tired he battles through. Facing the ghosts of those he has lost on the job, Frank tries to help the usual junkies and heart failures but gets involved with Mary when he gets called to her father's heart attack. Despite his tiredness, he tries to help Mary's more emotional pain.

My plot summary for this film is weak, I know that. However it is not weak because I am in a rush, it is weak because the film's narrative is also weak. The basic set up is interesting and this carries the film for the first hour but after this the film tries to settle into more of a story then it falls to bits. For the first half of the film the action is carried by it's visual style and it's pace  it is effortless to watch and is very slick and interesting. Indeed whenever the film stays away from it's story with Mary and focuses on style then it is most enjoyable. It may be very episodic during it's stylish tour of those in need of help but it's is enjoyable nonetheless. However when the film tries to follow a thread with Mary it becomes dull and you realize that this may have style in bucket loads but the substance was given out using an eggcup. For this reason I found it ultimately unsatisfying despite being worth a watch for Scorsese at work.

As a director he really pulls out the stops, it looks great and is visually never dull even if it's narrative is. The soundtrack is also very good even if it could easily be accused of excess in the same way as the visuals could be. Even though this is Scorsese's film, the cast still do OK if not great.

Cage is convincingly washed out for the duration even if isn't as good a character as he hoped. Arquette is not quite as bad as I've seen her but she is still quite poor here. She isn't great and it is partly her fault but also the fault of the material  after all she is given the poor narrative to carry. Goodman has presence if not much to do while Rhames and Sizemore really enjoy their OTT characters. Anthony and Turturro add to the film in minor roles (Anthony being especially good) but I didn't feel like Curtis worked in his role even if he was another well-known face and I was amused by Reyes in a pre-Scrubs medical role.

Overall this is a film that is all about the ride and, for that, it's worth seeing. I enjoyed it's energy, it's pace and it's style in terms of visuals and music, however the narrative is episodic at best and weak for the rest of the time. The best performances are mostly OTT, befitting the excessive mood set by Scorsese's direction but as enjoyable as it is on a stylish, pacey level it isn't satisfying as a total film or as a story."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64927,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Urbane legende
programme.desc: Naše urbane legende priče su koje su se prenosile generacijama te su sada postale dio urbanog folklora. Ali jesu li istinite? Naše urbane legende priče su koje su se prenosile generacijama te su sada postale dio urbanog folklora. Ali jesu li istinite? Bacit ćemo pomalo ironičan, nestašan - i namjerno dvosmislen - pogled na neobične priče o dobro poznatim povijesnim, umjetničkim i kulturnim ličnostima, koje su se možda stvarno dogodile, a možda i nisu.

credits.actor: Jerry Hoffmann, Luna Mwezi, Sarah Spale, Esther Gemsch, Lea Whitcher, Anouk Petri, Caspar Kaeser, Michael Schertenleib

The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6924650/","name":"Midway","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzA5Y2Q2YjktZDYwMi00NTdmLThlMjctMmY5NDgwOWRhZDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4534098/","name":"Ed Skrein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0452101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7873659/","name":"Wes Tooke"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198992153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Midway - In theaters Nov. 8, 2019. Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Luke Evans, Aaron Eckhart, Nick Jonas, Etsushi Toyokawa, Tadanobu Asano, Luke Kleintank, Jun Kunimura, Darren Criss, Keean Johnson, Alexander Ludwig, with Mandy Moore, Dennis Quaid and Woody Harrelson."},"datePublished":"2019-11-08","description":"The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.","keywords":"world war two,battle of midway,war at sea,warplane,u.s. military","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6924650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jimschultze"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Both good and disappointing - depends on the target audience","reviewBody":"As someone very knowledgeable about the subject, I was somewhat disappointed. Whether it was the wrinkled uniforms, the painful dialogue, the over-the-top dramatics and exaggerated explosions (hey, it's Emmerich!)... it was clear the film was not made for people like me who know the details and the characters very well.

The rating depends greatly on the target audience. It's clear this film was made for a younger audience, and as such, it does a very good job of conveying the history quite accurately. It's a lot to take on with a 2:20 movie (complete with a 6-month summary of events leading up to the title battle) and it does a fine job of that.

Correct history of this great nation tragically just isn't taught anymore, so I heartily applaud any effort to do so. I just wonder if younger audiences have any desire to learn it. So if I'm rating from that perspective, it jumps up a few points.

I just wish a little more care with the details and script had been taken to leave the older audience satisfied from our knowledge level.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6924650/","name":"Midway","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzA5Y2Q2YjktZDYwMi00NTdmLThlMjctMmY5NDgwOWRhZDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4534098/","name":"Ed Skrein","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0452101/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7873659/","name":"Wes Tooke"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198992153","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzVmYzI0ZTctOGM3MS00ODkyLThlNzQtY2Q3NTVlMTNmZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Midway - In theaters Nov. 8, 2019. Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Luke Evans, Aaron Eckhart, Nick Jonas, Etsushi Toyokawa, Tadanobu Asano, Luke Kleintank, Jun Kunimura, Darren Criss, Keean Johnson, Alexander Ludwig, with Mandy Moore, Dennis Quaid and Woody Harrelson.","datePublished":"2019-11-08","description":"The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.","keywords":"world war two,battle of midway,war at sea,warplane,u.s. military","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6924650/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jimschultze","dateCreated":"2019-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Both good and disappointing - depends on the target audience","reviewBody":"As someone very knowledgeable about the subject, I was somewhat disappointed. Whether it was the wrinkled uniforms, the painful dialogue, the over-the-top dramatics and exaggerated explosions (hey, it's Emmerich!)... it was clear the film was not made for people like me who know the details and the characters very well.

The rating depends greatly on the target audience. It's clear this film was made for a younger audience, and as such, it does a very good job of conveying the history quite accurately. It's a lot to take on with a 2:20 movie (complete with a 6-month summary of events leading up to the title battle) and it does a fine job of that.

Correct history of this great nation tragically just isn't taught anymore, so I heartily applaud any effort to do so. I just wonder if younger audiences have any desire to learn it. So if I'm rating from that perspective, it jumps up a few points.

I just wish a little more care with the details and script had been taken to leave the older audience satisfied from our knowledge level.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"duration":"PT2H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Simpsoni
programme.desc: Homer je slučajno zagadio gradski izvor vode i Agencija za zaštitu okoliša zatvorila je Springfield u veliku kupolu. Obitelj Simpson je proglašena bjeguncima. Nije im bila dovoljna serija, morali su dobiti i film. Na jezeru Springfield, punk bend Green Day nastrada kada se barka na kojoj su nastupali jednostavno rastopi zbog kemikalija koje plutaju zagađenom vodom. Na komemoraciji, djed Simpson doživi viziju u kojoj Springfield pogodi velika nesreća. Naravno, nitko ne vjeruje starom senilnom starcu osim Marge. Lisa i njena simpatija Colin uvjere grad da se jezero mora očistiti kako bi katastrofa bila spriječena. U međuvremenu, Homer spasi svinju iz Krusty Burgera, udomi je i nazove je Spider Pig. Homer pokazuje više ljubavi prema prasetu nego Bartu pa Bart odluči družiti se s obitelji Flanders.

Well worth your time and money.","reviewBody":"Excellent fun flick... and best movie Dinosaur in a long time ;-)

I promised my 8th grade nephew I'd take him to a movie this Christmas break - without his younger brothers and sisters. He originally wanted to see that dragon movie, but he found out it sucked, so I suggested this one.

With teens, there's the fine balance between too "kid" oriented and too dark, but he was laughing along the rest of the theater, and lost himself in the fun with the rest of us.

He wants to see it again, *I* want to see it again, and I recommend it for anyone with a sense of fun. It's also the first Ben Stiller movie in a while I can say that about. I hope you all reward the studio for putting out a true "family movie" for the holidays, so we'll see more in the future.

It was good to see Dick Van Dyke, Andy Rooney and Bill Cobbs in light, comic roles, and Robin Williams in a solid supporting role. They all lend the movie more "credibility."

GREAT FUN, easily worth 2 hours and $10.00, more than once over."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320094,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Najduže putovanje
programme.desc: Najduže putovanje upoznaje nas s Lukeom, bivšim prvakom u jahanju bikova koji se pokušava vratiti profesionalnom bavljenju ovim opasnim sportom, i Sophie. To je bilo putovanje na koje je vrijedilo poći. Luke Collins (Scott Eastwood) profesionalni je jahač bikova, kojeg je jedan nastup koštao ozbiljne povrede. Godinu dana nakon toga Luke je spreman ponovno uskočiti u sedlo i vratiti se pobjedničkim stazama, a uskoro upozna i studenticu umjetnosti Sophiju Danko (Britt Roberts).Vraćajući se s prvog spoja oboje svjedoče prometnoj nesreći i priskoče u pomoć starijem muškarcu zarobljenom u vozilu. Sophia tada ugleda kutiju od pruća i ponese je sa sobom kako bi je sačuvala. Mladi par nastavlja brinuti o starcu Iri Levinsonu (Alan Alda) redovito ga posjećujući u bolnici, a jedno prilikom on im otkrije sadržaj kutijice iz vozila. Ona je puna ljubavnih pisama, koje je napisao još kao tinejdžer. Pisma govore o tome kako je upoznao svoju pokojnu suprugu Ruth (Oona Chaplin) i opisuju njihovu vječnu ljubav.

credits.actor: Jolene Blalock, Justene Alpert, Najee De-Tiege, Bradley Dodds, Cole Gerdes, Steven Good, Ashli Haynes, Aaron Jakubenko
Amy Schumer, Michelle Williams, Tom Hopper, Rory Scovel, Adrian Martinez, Emily Ratajkowski, Aidy Bryant, Busy Philipps

Spielberg","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi757512217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E4ZGI5N2UtYTA5Yi00YjNmLTlmOWUtY2E3NTc2MWNmMjVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E4ZGI5N2UtYTA5Yi00YjNmLTlmOWUtY2E3NTc2MWNmMjVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg","description":"IMDb takes a closer look at the trademarks of Steven Spielberg's directorial style, including shooting stars, striking silhouettes, reflective perspectives, tracking shots, and more."},"datePublished":"1971-11-13","description":"A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.","keywords":"truck,mysterious villain,1970s,nervousness,california","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0067023/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"keihan"},"dateCreated":"2000-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"The ultimate car chase movie...","reviewBody":"Leave it to prosemaster extraordinaire, Richard Matheson (a favorite of mine and the man Stephen King acknowledges as being his biggest influence), to come up a premise so simple yet so believable and terrifying that the viewer will never look at an eighteen-wheeler the same way ever again...and leave it to cinematic wunderkind, Stephen Spielburg, to do right by Matheson's script and win acclaim in the bargain. 

Though some may argue that "Bullit", "Vanishing Point", or maybe even the original "Gone in 60 Seconds" could be called the ultimate car chase movie, "Duel" deserves this designation better because it does something none of the above films can claim. The story literally starts on the road and ends on the road. No location in the entire film is ever out of sight of the highway and, in spite of the brief conversation with the wife, virtually nothing else happens outside the highway. For David Mann (played adequately enough by Dennis Weaver) and the monster truck he's trying to get away from, the road and everything alongside it is their entire universe. Nothing else of importance exists outside of it.

Though it's never mentioned in the film, this would seem to take place on the California highways. When I went out there about eight years ago, I went down roads that seemed to be not too dissimiliar to the ones shown here. They seemed to stretch on forever, no vestiges of civilization in sight for miles. Spielburg uses this setting to great advantage. Being in your car in a crowded city intersection is one thing, but on those highways with nothing but your car and a homicidal maniac in a diesel for miles? The isolation factor that cars naturally produce jumps up a thousand percent. The radiator hose problem made me think of many other times that I had similar troubles with cars I've had. Of course, I never had someone trying to kill me at the time, but...

Anyone looking for drama, character development, or all the other elements that pseudo-critics point out as the mark of cinematic excellence are liable to be disappointed by "Duel". It's what King described in "Danse Macabre" as a Tale of the Hook. It's only purpose is to scare the hell out of you. Damn if it doesn't work. THAT'S the mark of a classic."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: To toplo ljeto
programme.desc: Vrijeme prvih televizora, igranki, epoha šlagera i rock and roll-a, duh i specifičan način života Banjaluke su okvirna tema serijala. Romantično ljubavna komedija "To toplo ljeto" serija je koja se sa osmijehom i sjećanjem posvetila Banjaluci i po mnogo čemu značajnoj i prelomnoj, 1968. godini. Vrijeme prvih televizora, igranki, epoha šlagera i rock and roll-a, duh i specifičan način života Banjaluke su okvirna tema serijala. U deset epizoda prati priču o lijepoj Anki i nadmetanju nekoliko, po svemu različitih ljudi koji se bore za njenu ljubav. Paralelne priče o nekoliko porodica utkanih u mentalitet Banjaluke i vremenski kontekst kraja šezdesetih godina čine dramaturšku fresku koja je namijenjena svim uzrastima i svim profilima gledalaca. Projekat je nastao u koprodukciji Radio-televizije Republike Srpske, Pink Internacional Company i MM Production, pod pokroviteljstvom Vlade RS i Grada Banja Luka.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Obični ljudi
programme.desc: "Obični ljudi" urbana je priča koja prati život triju sestara i njihovih roditelja glumaca. Svaka od sestara ima potpuno različit životni put. Na različit način u njihovom životu i životima... "Obični ljudi" urbana je priča koja prati život triju sestara i njihovih roditelja glumaca. Svaka od sestara ima potpuno različit životni put. Na različit način u njihovom životu i životima ljudi koji ih okružuju, prelamaju se i njihove frustracije iz djetinjstva: odlaskom njihove majke Karoline kad je Vanji bilo 11, Matiji 7, a Saši su tada bile 3 godine. Susrećemo ih u trenutku kad svaka ima svoj samostalan život.Nakon Karolininog odlaska, najstarija sestra Vanja odigrala je "majčinsku figuru" u obitelji. Vodi restoran zajedno s najboljom prijateljicom Tamarom, dokljubavnu vezu održava s mladim instruktorom joge, Robertom, koji iz propalog braka ima maloljetnog sina Vedrana.Najemotivnija sestra Matija, u braku je s Lukom Draganom, sinom Ante Dragana, jednog od najuspješnijih auto-zastupnika u Hrvatskoj. Luka, kao i njegov brat Pavle rade za oca u Autokući Dragan.Najmlađa sestra Saša je diplomirala na Medicinskom fakultetu te je počela raditi na zagrebačkoj Peščenici. U vezi je s Slavenom, također budućim doktorom, kojeg je tokom cijelog fakulteta tetošila i pomagala mu da stekne doktorsku diplomu, a on joj je to sve vratio jednom prevarom, za koju i sama Saša ubrzo sazna. Iste noći, upušta se u seksualni odnos s nepoznatim muškarcem. Uskoro, Saša saznaje kako je trudna. No pitanje je : tko je otac?Majka koja ih je napustila, Karolina, upravo dobiva veliku glumačku šansu: ulogu žene svog bivšeg supruga i oca triju sestara, Ivice u obnovljenoj seriji koja je njemu donijela slavu. Karolina se vraća u njihove živote, što sestre ne ostavlja ravnodušnima, a bogme ni samog Ivicu, u kojeg se pak zaljubi mnogo mlađa kolegica Ema Knez.

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Domaća serija Kafanica blizu SIS-a je humoristička serija koja govori o jednoj firmi iz Vlasotinaca, koja se bavi rešavanjem raznih problema koje klijenti svakodnevno imaju. Domaća serija Kafanica blizu SIS-a je humoristička serija koja govori o jednoj firmi iz Vlasotinaca, koja se bavi rešavanjem raznih problema koje klijenti svakodnevno imaju. Gazda firme je cicija i na sve načine izbegava troši pare. Gazda je Spiridon Don Karamarković, čija je desna ruka sestrić Mulja, a tu je i pomoćnica Roza, koja je glavna kada Spiridona nema.

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.
